definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate and compare the scavenging effect to hydroxyl radical of different extracts from the seeds of Hovenia acerba Lindl.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較枳椇子不同提取部位對羥自由基的清除作用。

sentences.english: The chromosomes in root tip cells of Trifoliate orange(Poncirus trifoliata Raf. )and Ichang papeda(Citrus ichangensis Swingle)were observed by enzymic maceration technique.
sentences.chinese: 用酶解法觀察了枳和宜昌橙根尖細胞的染色體。

sentences.english: The preliminary performance of Shatianyou (Citrus grandis Osbeck) on 4 types of trifoliate orange (Poncirus trifoliata Raf. )rootstock were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 比較了4個枳選系作沙田柚砧木的早期表現。

definition: a thorny tree/sugarcane/Cudrania triloba/three-bristle cudrania (Cudrania tricuspidata)/Chinese mulberry (Cudrania)
Chinese peony (Paeonia lactiflora)/common herbaceous peony/peony used in TCM
capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
